short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A war information blocking plugin for your Facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ukrainian war is a topic that is now everywhere. This can cause damage to people who read these news whole day. Now you can block war-related posts on Facebook. Say "No War In My Feed"

No War In My Feed  is enabling you to either cover all the posts with a warning about the war-related content of the post or skip those posts entirely.

Are most of the post you’re seeing in other than English language? Add more words and prevent „War-post“ in multiple languages from popping up.
